external_games.name: Larry Bond's Harpoon 3: Advanced Naval Warfare
Larry Bond's Harpoon 3: Advanced Naval Warfare

name: Larry Bond's Harpoon 3: Advanced Naval Warfare
summary:
Harpoon 3 Advanced Naval Warfare is the result of decades of development and fan support, resulting in the most comprehensive, realistic, and accurate simulation of modern combined air and naval operations available to the gaming public.

Harpoon 3 Advanced Naval Warfare gives you the opportunity to manage some of the most advanced air and naval assets available in the world. It puts you in the middle of many historical and ‘what if’ scenarios.

There are plenty of scenarios to choose from, with more than 120 pre-designed missions included. You'll have the chance to play them from either side, experiencing a wide variety of challenges.
